title: Looking for people
body: Looking for some fun people to play with tonight, ill hopefully be drinking a little bit but i dont get drunk so dont worry about that, looking to play some flex or norms, i kinda wanna try the whole mage support that ive been seeing lately, I have discord but i am a little shy at first haha what ever you do just dont let me play top, im soooo bad at it!  atm im S3 happy to play with any rank :D S5 or S4 in flex atm i cant remember, but hit me up :D or comment your ign cause mines a bit hard haha :)

replies.body: i am a people, i am a top main, so it should be fun ahahaha XD , i will pop thought a friend request.
Hi, I'm keen to play some flex if you are. I'm currently unranked in flex but g5 in solo. IGN: Gnesh
i havent been on league lately got a new game called stardew valley but i will for sure add you :)
